sentences: Ma ütlesin talle, et see on hea mõte.
Ta ütles, et ta armastab seda raamatut.
Nende vanemad ütlesid, et nad peavad lähemaks minema.
context: The word ütlesid is a verb in Estonian that means to say or speak something, and it is commonly used in everyday conversations to convey thoughts or opinions.
